# target

**Instance Property**

The UI control that receives pasted content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var target: (any UIPasteConfigurationSupporting)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For example, you can assign this property a reference to a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextView].
